author: Marvel Entertainment
description:
This week, Deadpool VR Lead Designer Phil Therien and Animation Director Matt Schmitz share what players can look forward to in the game. Then, Marvel Comics Editor Devin Lewis gives a spooky rundown on the new horror comic Marvel: Black, White, and Blood & Guts and Spirits of Violence. Later on, we’ll dig into the comic book history of Johnny Blaze a.k.a. Ghost Ride. All time codes are approximate.

00:00 - Welcome Back! 
1:09 -  Deadpool VR Lead Designer Phil Therien and Animation Director Matt Schmitz give a sneak peek!
10:32 - Marvel Comics Editor Devin Lewis on new horror comic Marvel: Black, White, and Blood & Guts and Spirits of Violence
20:13 - Comic book history of Johnny Blaze a.k.a. Ghost Rider

Follow on social media to get the latest news
title: Sneak Peek at Marvel's Deadpool VR!
